footer.text: Character Guide • Synergy: Xiao | Update Date: 08/06/2022 | Editor: LordOfEnnui#8710

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
When running Raiden, casting her Elemental Skill is greatly beneficial, as it provides a significant amount of energy, added sub-DPS and Swirl Reaction damage.

When running Yelan or Xingqiu, Xiao should N1JP, a Normal Attack cancelled with a Jump followed by a High Plunge. As Yelan's coordinated attacks come out faster, the Normal Attack can be canceled a bit earlier than it can for Xingqiu.
